publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1087 Jim Mather: Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament supports the principle of clauses in the Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts Bill, introduced in the House of Lords on 7 November 2007, providing for the collection and distribution of sums released from dormant bank and building society accounts for social and environmental purposes, and agrees that the provisions in the Bill that relate to the distribution of such sums in Scotland should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: John Swinney*

S3M-1087 Jim Mather: Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts Bill - UK Legislation—That the Parliament supports the principle of clauses in the Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts Bill, introduced in the House of Lords on 7 November 2007, providing for the collection and distribution of sums released from dormant bank and building society accounts for social and environmental purposes, and agrees that the provisions in the Bill that relate to the distribution of such sums in Scotland should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: John Swinney
S3M-1087 Withdrawn Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
